duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement workflows using Power Automate and Power Apps to automate business processes.
Integrate Power Automate with various systems and cloud-based services.
Identify opportunities for process automation and provide recommendations on leveraging Power Automate.
Test, debug, and troubleshoot Power Automate workflows and connectors.
Document technical specifications, system architecture, and workflow designs.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of Power Automate workflows with other systems and applications.
Identify and communicate the technical infrastructure requirements for deploying automation solutions.
Support UAT and production deployment of automation solutions.
